column4: anyone know where to get drivers for an NVIDIA 8600GTS? the ones from NVIDIA.com seem to not work on ubuntu 9.04
as in, nvidia's drivers are in .run format, don't know how to open them

if possible use the builtin driver dialog instead, if you don't do that, you run a big risk of breaking your installation to a point that can only be fixed by adding kernel parameters and diving into config files on the terminal
